summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 HYUNDAI VELOSTER. WHILE OPERATING THE VEHICLE, THE SPEED SUDDENLY DECREASED AND THE VEHICLE FAILED TO ACCELERATE PROPERLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THE ENGINE WAS FAULTY DUE TO LOW PRESSURE IN ONE CYLINDER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER AND LOCAL DEALER WERE NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 91,000.
